# k-nearest Neighbors

```{r}
knn_opts = data.frame(k=c(seq(3, 11, 2), 25, 51, 101))
knn_opts

results_knn = train(quality~., 
                    data=wine_train, 
                    method='knn',
                    preProcess=c('center', 'scale'), 
                    trControl=cv_opts,
                    tuneGrid = knn_opts)

results_knn
```

```{r}
preds_knn = predict(results_knn, wine_test)
confusionMatrix(preds_knn, good_observed, positive='good')
```
